testsuite.name: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: When I click the Source button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: And I click inside the Source editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: And I enter Inline latex '<' inside the Source Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: And I enter 'AND' inside the Source editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: When I click the Source button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: And I click the Source button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: Then I see 'AND' inside the Source editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that < symbol does not eat up content to the right of it when casted as a math widget.
